statements: SELECT * FROM SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT crop_type, productivity_index FROM SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity WHERE planting_season = 'Spring';
SELECT year, crop_type, productivity_index FROM SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity WHERE productivity_index > 1.5;
SELECT * FROM SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity WHERE harvest_season = 'Autumn' ORDER BY productivity_index DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_type FROM SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity WHERE year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity WHERE crop_type = 'Rice';
SELECT id, crop_type, year, productivity_index FROM SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY productivity_index DESC;
SELECT * FROM SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity WHERE year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020 AND harvest_season = 'Fall';
SELECT AVG(productivity_index) AS avg_productivity_index, crop_type FROM SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity GROUP BY crop_type ORDER BY avg_productivity_index DESC;
SELECT crop_type, planting_season, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity GROUP BY crop_type, planting_season HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Crop_Data WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM Crop_Data WHERE planting_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT temperature, precipitation FROM Weather_Data WHERE date = '2022-03-15' AND location = 'New York';
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM Crop_Data WHERE yield_amount > 1000 ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Weather_Data WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY precipitation DESC, temperature ASC;
SELECT * FROM Crop_Data WHERE yield_amount > 100 ORDER BY harvest_date DESC
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvesting_date FROM Crop_Data WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY planting_date ASC
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM Crop_Data WHERE yield_amount < 50 AND planting_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM Crop_Data WHERE crop_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND yield_amount > 75 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM Crop_Data INNER JOIN Weather_Data ON Crop_Data.planting_date = Weather_Data.date WHERE Weather_Data.temperature > 25 ORDER BY Weather_Data.temperature DESC
SELECT * FROM Seasonal_Trends WHERE region = 'North'
SELECT year, season, productivity FROM Seasonal_Trends ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT crop, yield FROM Crop_Yield WHERE region = 'South' AND year > 2015
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(rainfall) AS avg_rainfall FROM Weather_Data GROUP BY region
SELECT DISTINCT year FROM Seasonal_Trends ORDER BY year ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Seasonal_Trends ORDER BY productivity DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT SUM(temperature), AVG(rainfall) FROM Weather_Data WHERE year > 2015 GROUP BY region;
SELECT region, season, AVG(yield) FROM Crop_Yield WHERE year = 2020 GROUP BY region, season HAVING AVG(yield) > 100;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp, MAX(rainfall) AS max_rainfall, MIN(rainfall) AS min_rainfall FROM Weather_Data WHERE region = 'North' AND season = 'Winter';
SELECT region, season, productivity FROM Seasonal_Trends WHERE productivity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY region ASC, productivity DESC;
SELECT * FROM farmers;
SELECT name, location FROM farmers WHERE farming_experience_years > 5;
SELECT crop_name, season, average_yield FROM crops WHERE average_yield > 1000;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2023-05-10';

SELECT farmers.name, crops.crop_name, productivity_score FROM farmers JOIN productivity_analysis ON farmers.farmer_id = productivity_analysis.farmer_id JOIN crops ON crops.crop_id = productivity_analysis.crop_id WHERE productivity_score > 8.0;
SELECT name, location, farming_experience_years FROM farmers WHERE farming_experience_years > 5 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT crop_name, season, average_yield FROM crops WHERE season = 'Summer' ORDER BY average_yield DESC;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity, rainfall FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND rainfall < 10 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT farmer_id, crop_name, productivity_score FROM productivity_analysis WHERE productivity_score > 0.8 ORDER BY productivity_score DESC;

SELECT farming_experience_years, name, location, crop_name, productivity_score FROM farmers JOIN productivity_analysis ON farmers.farmer_id = productivity_analysis.farmer_id JOIN crops ON productivity_analysis.crop_id = crops.crop_id ORDER BY farming_experience_years ASC, productivity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM SeasonalTrends ORDER BY year DESC, month ASC
SELECT crop_name, profit FROM CropData WHERE yield > 1000
SELECT date, temperature FROM WeatherConditions WHERE rainfall < 50
SELECT farm_name, location FROM FarmManagement ORDER BY farm_name
SELECT crop_name, projected_yield, projected_profit FROM ProductionForecast
SELECT * FROM SeasonalTrends ORDER BY year DESC, month ASC
SELECT crop_name, profit, yield FROM CropData WHERE yield > 100 ORDER BY profit DESC
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherConditions WHERE temperature > 25 AND rainfall < 50 ORDER BY date
SELECT farm_name, location FROM FarmManagement WHERE manager_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT crop_name, projected_yield FROM ProductionForecast WHERE forecast_date = '2023-05-15'
